answers.answer: I am 30+6 right now and found out at 29 weeks that I have gestational diabetes.. so my dr said of my baby starts growing too much and gets at an unhealthy weight that I will probably have to be induced and maybe even possibly get a c-section... I really hope not!! I hope she grows normal
Now jist because you measure big dont mean nothing you have alot of amomitic fliuld so be careful baby could come out small if induced
Oh yeah i didn't even think of the amniotic fluid, i just thought Im gonna have a huge baby!
Well it could be a big baby but if could ve the fluild i definaly watch for that thou

question: At my last midwife appointment she told me i was measuring at 39 weeks pregnant which was 4 weeks more than i was at that stage at 35 weeks. She has booked me in for a growth scan tomorrow to see if baby is measuring okay and if i need to be induced. Has anyone else gone through this? What's the likelihood that i will get induced? Im 36+5 at the moment now.
title: getting induced vs going natural
